description.@en: Through a complex series of prayers and guidance, you finally bring peace to the afflicted.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch is cured of one Disorder they are currently suffering from. A Character may only gain the benefit of this Magick once per day.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but if the person lost points from their Primary Attributes from a Disorderâ€™s Effects, they can restore the lost points.

criticalFailure.@en: You mangled the words to the prayer. The afflicted is not brought peace, but instead inflicted by chaos. You fail to cure the Disorder, instead triggering its Effects instantly

reagents.@en: Three vials of holy water, imbibed by the victim (expended)

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
